title: Aetna Inc makes takeover proposal to Humana Inc - WSJ

content: June 25 Health insurer Aetna Inc is close to buying rival Humana Inc  and a deal could be signed as early as this weekend  Bloomberg reported.
name: Humana Inc
title: REFILE-Aetna close to buying Humana - Bloomberg

content: WASHINGTON  June 20 Health insurer Aetna Inc  has made a takeover proposal to rival Humana Inc   the Wall Street Journal reported on Saturday. It gave no details.        (Reporting by Mohammad Zargham Editing by W Simon)

content: ZAGREB  June 11 The Croatian government said on Thursday it would invite banks to advise on the sale of a stake of up to 60 percent in indebted state-owned motorway management company HAC which it hoped would raise around 1.5 billion euros ($1.7 billion).
name: Humana Inc
title: Croatia seeks adviser for IPO of state motorway company

content: Humana Inc  is considering selling itself after receiving multiple expressions of takeover interest  a person familiar with the matter said on Friday  highlighting the widening consolidation in the U.S. health insurance industry.
name: Humana Inc
title: Health insurer Humana explores sale:  source

content: U.S. health insurer Humana Inc  said on Wednesday there was an unexpected pick-up in the rate of hospital admissions late in March and in April  sparking a sell-off in its own and other insurers' shares.
name: Humana Inc
title: Humana says hospital admissions up as sector shares fall

content: April 29 U.S. health insurer Humana Inc  said on Wednesday there was an unexpected pick-up in the rate of hospital admissions late in March and in April  sparking a sell-off in its own and other insurers' shares.
name: Humana Inc
title: UPDATE 3-Humana says hospital admissions up as sector shares fall

content: NEW YORK  April 29 Humana Inc Chief Financial Officer Brian Kane said on Wednesday that the insurer had seen a "slight uptick" in hospital admissions for Medicare Advantage members during the last few weeks of the first quarter and in April.
name: Humana Inc
title: Humana CFO says Medicare hospitalizations higher than foreseen

content: April 29 U.S. health insurer Humana Inc  reported a rise in quarterly profit as it added more members to its individual Medicare Advantage business.
name: Humana Inc
title: Health insurer Humana's profit rises

content: NEW YORK  April 7 Humana Inc  a health insurer that manages Medicare Advantage health plans for the elderly and disabled  said on Tuesday that it believes the government's final plan payment rates represent a 0.8 percent increase in funding to it.
name: Humana Inc
title: Humana expects Medicare Advantage payments to create funding increase

content: NEW YORK  March 30 UnitedHealth Group Inc's  planned takeover of No. 4 U.S. pharmacy benefits provider Catamaran Corp will give the companies added heft in price talks with drug companies  serving as a catalyst for deals allowing other insurers to bulk up.
name: Humana Inc
title: UnitedHealth-Catamaran deal sets up healthcare M&A chessboard

content: NEW YORK Humana Inc  one of the largest U.S. providers of Medicare Advantage healthcare plans for older people  said on Tuesday that it believes a previously disclosed government query for information is part of a wider review involving many healthcare companies.
name: Humana Inc
title: Humana says previously disclosed DOJ query involves other companies

content: NEW YORK Health insurer Humana Inc  said on Monday that it would sell its Concentra urgent care and physical therapy services unit for about $1 billion to private equity firm Welsh  Carson  Anderson & Stowe and Select Medical Holdings Corp .
name: Humana Inc
title: Humana to sell Concentra medical center unit for $1 billion

content: U.S. health insurer Humana Inc  reported a lower-than- expected fourth-quarter profit as it spent more on new hepatitis C treatments and flu season expenses increased  but it said those and other costs are behind it and predicted a better 2015.
name: Humana Inc
title: Humana profit misses but shares rise on 2015 outlook

content: Feb 4 U.S. health insurer Humana Inc  reported a lower-than- expected fourth-quarter profit as it spent more on new hepatitis C treatments and flu season expenses increased  but it said those and other costs are behind it and predicted a better 2015.
name: Humana Inc
title: UPDATE 2-Humana profit misses but shares rise on 2015 outlook

content: Feb  4U.S. health insurer Humana Inc  posted a pretax profit for the fourth quarter  compared with a loss a year earlier  reflecting a rise in individual Medicare Advantage memberships.
name: Humana Inc
title: Health insurer Humana reports pretax profit
